price: (Muhammad) ni jedhe: “(Yaa) Rabbi! (Anaafi warra ana sobsiisan giddutti) dhugaan murtii godhi, Gooftaan keenya Rahmaani, waan isin jettan irratti gargaarsifatamaadha.
arabic: قَٰلَ رَبِّ ٱحۡكُم بِٱلۡحَقِّۗ وَرَبُّنَا ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ ٱلۡمُسۡتَعَانُ عَلَىٰ مَا تَصِفُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi uḥ'kum bil-ḥaqi warabbunā al-raḥmānu al-mus'taʿānu ʿalā mā taṣifūna
translations: the One Whose help is sought
